name: NSTextContentManagerDelegate
desc: The optional methods that delegates of content manager objects implement for customizing or validating text elements.

items.name: func textContentManager(NSTextContentManager, textElementAt: NSTextLocation) -> NSTextElement?
items.desc: The method the framework calls to return the text element at a specific location.

items.name: func textContentManager(NSTextContentManager, shouldEnumerate: NSTextElement, options: NSTextContentManager.EnumerationOptions) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the framework should skip this text element in the enumeration.
